original_title: Crash Masters: Secret Life of the Ninja
overview: The leader (Yasuaki Kurata) of a well-known group of Hong Kong ninjas goes after a dangerous mob family and ends up facing off with the brood's youngest member, a female kendo champion (Elsa Yeung). With help from local law enforcement and a suspected ninja fighter (Chen Kuan Tai), the young girl sets out to protect her family. The climax features a high-stakes duel that will pit one ninja against another in a fight for freedom.
title: Crash Masters: Secret Life of the Ninja
